resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104960</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104960</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211698</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Projectile Motion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wurfbewegung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement de Projectile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento Do Projectile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento Del Proiettile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Projectile κίνηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento Del Proyectil</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Blast a Buick out of a cannon! Learn about projectile motion by firing various objects. Set the angle, initial speed, and mass. Add air resistance. Make a game out of this simulation by trying to hit a target.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprengen Sie ein Buick aus einer Kanone heraus! 
Erlernen Sie über Wurfbewegung, indem Sie verschiedene 
Nachrichten abfeuern. Stellen Sie den Winkel, die 
Ausgangsgeschwindigkeit und die Masse ein. Fügen Sie 
Luftwiderstand hinzu. Bilden Sie ein Spiel aus dieser Simulation
heraus, indem Sie versuchen, ein Ziel zu schlagen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Soufflez un Buick hors d'un canon ! 
Renseignez-vous sur le mouvement de projectile en mettant le feu
à de divers objets. Placez l'angle, la vitesse initiale, et la 
masse. Ajoutez la résistance d'air. Faites un jeu hors de
cette simulation par l'essai de frapper une cible.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Expluda um Buick fora de um canhão! Aprenda
sobre o movimento do projectile ateando fogo a vários objetos. 
Ajuste o ângulo, a velocidade inicial, e a massa. 
Adicione a resistência do ar. Faça um jogo fora desta 
simulação tentando bater um alvo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Faccia saltare un Buick da un cannone! 
Impari circa movimento del proiettile infornando i vari oggetti.
Regoli l'angolo, la velocità iniziale e la massa. 
Aggiunga la resistenza dell'aria. Faccia un gioco da 
questa simulazione provando a colpire un obiettivo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανατινάξτε ένα Buick από ένα πυροβόλο! 
Μάθετε για την projectile κίνηση με την πυρκαγιά των 
διάφορων αντικειμένων. Θέστε τη γωνία, την αρχική 
ταχύτητα, και τη μάζα. Προσθέστε την αντίσταση αέρα. 
Κάνετε ένα παιχνίδι από αυτήν την προσομοίωση με την 
προσπάθεια να χτυπηθεί ένας στόχος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Arruine un Buick fuera de un cañón! 
Aprenda sobre el movimiento del proyectil encendiendo varios 
objetos. Fije el ángulo, la velocidad inicial, y la masa. 
Agregue la resistencia del aire. Haga un juego fuera de 
esta simulación intentando golpear una blanco.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211698</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104960</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/projectile-motion</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
